document.full_text: the u.s. supreme court on tuesday cleared the way for resentencing former media baron conrad black next month in chicago for fraud and obstruction of justice after rejecting his appeal.
document.title: top court rejects ex-media baron black's appeal
lines_and_colors: the u.s. supreme court on tuesday cleared the way for resentencing former media baron conrad black next month in chicago for fraud and obstruction of justice after rejecting his appeal.
